channel.title: django-syndication on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in django-syndication on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
According to the documentation here: https://djangobook.com/syndication-feed-framework/

If link doesnâ€™t return the domain, the syndication framework will insert the domain of the current site, according to your SITE_ID setting

However, I’m trying to generate a feed of magnet: links. The framework doesn’t recognize this and attempts to append the SITE_ID, such that the links end up like this (on localhost):

<link>http://localhost:8000magnet:?xt=...</link>

Is there a way to bypass this?
